original_title: 乗り物大好き! NEW てつどうスペシャル50
overview: "Tetsudou" version of the series full of popular vehicles for children. Fifty kinds of trains selected from the railway active in Japan such as Shinkansen, SL (steam locomotive), limited express, etc. are recorded with powerful images. Introducing a nostalgic train that is not running now as a bonus picture.
title: Norimono Daisuki! New Tetsudou Special 50
